description: A massive sunspot complex has appeared on the Sun, covering an area comparable to the legendary Carrington Event region. Known as AR 4294-96, the active cluster features highly tangled magnetic fields that could unleash powerful solar flares and geomagnetic storms, potentially disrupting satellites, power grids, and global communications if Earth-directed eruptions occur.
title: Massive Sunspot Complex on the Sun Raises Risk of Strong Solar Storms

description: Microsoft, on Tuesday, announced an investment of $17.5 billion (roughly Rs. 1.57 lakh crore) in India to develop artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud infrastructure, support government projects around skilling, and to expand its ongoing projects. The announcement was made by the Redmond-based tech giant’s CEO Satya Nadella and Prime Minister Narendra Modi held a meeting.
title: Microsoft to Invest $17.5 Billion to Scale India’s AI and Cloud, Joins Google and OpenAI’s Recent Push

description: Angels Fallen is set for its OTT release on Lionsgate Play from December 12, 2025. The movie blends supernatural action, mythology, and emotional conflict, led by a strong cast including Nicola Posener, Houston Rhines, Michael Madsen, Eric Roberts and more. Viewers can expect intense battles, dark themes, and a gripping journey of redemption as the warrior Gabriel confronts ancient demonic forces.
title: Angels Fallen OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Ronkini Bhavan is a Bengali web series, based on the absence of new women in her husband's ancestral home, which is coming soon on ZEE5.
title: Ronkini Bhavan OTT Release: Know Where to Watch This Bengali Web Series Online?

description: The Great Shamsuddin Family is a warm, hilarious and emotional desi family drama arriving on OTT on December 12, 2025. The film captures the relatable chaos of a joint family where misunderstandings, traditions, secrets and comedy all collide.
title: The Great Shamsuddin Family OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: One of the most anticipated seasons of the Top Cooku Dupe Cooku is finally streaming on the OTT. The show will witness a celebrity paired with a Dupe cook as they seek to win the title.
title: Top Cooku Dupe Cooku Season 2 Now Streaming Online: Know Where to Watch This Reality Cooking Series

description: Axis Bank offers multiple quick ways to block your credit card if it is lost, stolen, or misused. You can block your card using the mobile app, internet banking, the Axis Bank support website, or the Axis Aha! chatbot, SMS, or by calling customer care. These methods help stop unauthorised transactions instantly and allow you to request a replacement card safely. With rising card fraud, knowing these simple blocking steps ensures fast protection and peace of mind.
title: How to Block Axis Bank Credit Card Using Different Methods Online: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Want to delete your Snapchat account? In this guide, we’ll walk you through how to delete your Snapchat account. You can delete your Snapchat account using a web browser on a desktop or laptop, or you can choose to delete your account from the Snapchat app on an Android smartphone or iPhone.
title: How to Delete Your Snapchat Account on Mobile and Web: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: OpenAI’s “code red” push is reportedly accelerating progress, with GPT-5.2 expected to launch this week and another major model planned for January. According to The Wall Street Journal, GPT-5.2 will bring coding and enterprise improvements, while the January model may offer better image generation, richer personality and lower latency. Code red will remain in effect until both releases land, as Altman prioritises user-driven signals and performance on ranking platforms like LMArena.
title: OpenAI to Reportedly Release GPT-5.2 AI Model This Week, But ‘Code Red’ Will Continue

description: Apple’s MacBook Air with the M4 processor, which was launched by the tech giant in March, is one of the best thin and light laptops in India under Rs. 1 lakh. However, if you do not want to buy a MacBook, you can also choose a thin and light laptop running Windows 11, like the Samsung Galaxy Book 5, the Lenovo Yoga Slim 7, the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED, or the Vivobook S14. The laptops mentioned above offer the best combination of performance and practicality, due to their slim and light form factor.
title: Best Thin and Light Laptops Under Rs. 1 Lakh in India: MacBook Air (M4), Samsung Galaxy Book 5, and More

description: Google has announced extended support programs for select Pixel 9 series phones after identifying hardware issues. The programs cover the Pixel 9 Pro, 9 Pro XL, and 9 Pro Fold, and began on December 8, 2025. The Pixel 9 Pro and 9 Pro XL are eligible for free display replacements for up to three years, while the Pixel 9 Pro Fold may qualify for a full free replacement. All approved repairs and replacements will include a 90-day service warranty.
title: Google Pixel 9 Pro, Pixel 9 Pro XL and Pixel 9 Pro Fold Extended Repair Program for Specific Hardware Issues Announced

description: Google has detailed the security architecture behind Chrome’s new agentic features, aiming to protect users from risks such as prompt injection and malicious website behaviour. The system includes a separate “user alignment critic” to verify agent actions, stricter origin isolation, mandatory user confirmations for sensitive tasks and real-time threat detection. Google says these layers prepare Chrome for an “agentic web” where AI agents take a more active role in browsing.
title: Google Shares Safety Guardrails for Chrome Browser’s Agentic Capabilities

description: The Nothing Phone 3a Community Edition is available in a single colour option. The handset is packed with a 6.77-inch Full HD+ AMOLED display that offers up to 3,000nits of peak brightness. The Nothing Phone 3a Pro is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 processor and offers a triple-camera setup on the rear panel. The device offers a 5,000 mAh battery and includes some interesting AI features. Check out the first impressions to know more about the latest Nothing device.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Community Edition First Impressions

description: Nothing Phone 3a Community Edition was launched in India on Tuesday. It arrives as a special edition variant of the Nothing Phone 3a, which was introduced in March this year. The handset is said to be a collaborative effort as part of the Community Edition Project, incorporating design aesthetics and UI elements chosen from submissions by more than 700 members of the Nothing Community.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Community Edition Launched in India With Custom Hardware Design and Custom UI Elements: Price, Features

description: Renders of the Moto G Stylus (2026) and Tag 2 have leaked online. The images suggest two colour options for the Moto G Stylus (2026). It is likely to come with a triple rear camera unit, a 6.7-inch display and a 5,000mAh battery. The Motorola Edge 70 Ultra will reportedly come with support for a stylus. The Moto Tag 2 could support Google’s Find My  Device feature. It is likely to go official alongside the Moto G Stylus (2026).
title: Moto G Stylus (2026) Design Spotted in Leaked Renders Alongside Moto Tag 2; Motorola Edge 70 Ultra Tipped to Offer Stylus Support

description: Qualcomm has acquired Augentix, a maker of low-power ISPs and multimedia chipsets, to strengthen its Insight Platform and expand its edge AI camera offerings. The company says the deal will help deliver secure, scalable camera solutions for markets such as India, where demand is rising amid rapid digital infrastructure growth. Augentix’s technology will support a wider range of smart-camera designs and become a core part of Qualcomm’s platform.
title: Qualcomm Acquires Augentix to Expand Smart Camera Portfolio and Insight Platform

description: Samsung Galaxy XR, the company’s first extended reality (XR) headset, was launched globally in October. The Galaxy XR ships with Android XR, Google’s dedicated operating system (OS) for XR devices. Now, Google has announced that it is bringing new features for the XR headset with the latest Android XR update, which started rolling out on Monday. The Galaxy XR users will now be able to connect their headsets to a PC and create a digital representation of their faces for video calls.
title: The Android Show: Google Teases AI Smart Glasses Alongside Likeness, PC Connect For Samsung Galaxy XR Headset

description: Honor Robot Phone's global unveiling is scheduled to take place during the Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2026 in March. Ahead of it, a Chinese tipster suggested that the handset will enter mass production in the first half of next year. This suggests that the concept device is now a step closer to the commercial launch. The commercial launch may take place after the MWC unveiling.
title: Honor Robot Phone to Enter Mass Production in H1 2026, Tipster Claims

description: Samsung has opened preorders for the Galaxy Z TriFold in China, following its recent launch in South Korea. Prices start at CNY 19,999 (roughly Rs. 2,54,500) for the 16GB + 512GB variant. The tri-fold phone features a 10-inch inner AMOLED display, a 6.5-inch cover screen, Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset, and Android 16-based One UI 8. It packs a 200-megapixel camera and a 5,600mAh battery with fast charging.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Now Available to Pre-Order in China: Price, Specifications

description: Starlink, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Elon Musk's SpaceX, recently updated its website the reveal the prices of its Residential subscription in India. Soon after the revelation, the satcom firm received flak for relatively high pricing. Now, Lauren Dreyer, the Vice President of Business Operations at Starlink, has clarified in a post on X that the reported pricing was "dummy test data", which was briefly made public due to a "config glitch". The company executive also highlighted that it is yet to receive the final government approval to launch operations.
title: Starlink Executive Clarifies: India Pricing Was a 'Glitch', Still Awaiting Launch Approval

description: Truecaller has introduced a new Family Protection feature that lets users create groups of up to five people to manage spam-blocking and safety settings collectively. A designated Family Admin can adjust protection levels, manage blocklists and, on Android, even receive scam-call alerts and end calls remotely. The feature is rolling out in select countries now and will reach India in early 2026, with extra tools available via a Premium Family plan.
title: Truecaller Introduces New Feature to Protect the Entire Family from Call-Based Scams

description: Tech behemoths Apple and Google are said to have joined hands to develop a functionality that could make the process of switching between Android and iPhone easier. According to a report, the in-development feature was sighted in the latest Android Canary build, released today (December 9). While it isn’t available to the public yet, it is believed that Apple will implement the iPhone-Android transfer functionality in an upcoming iOS 26 Beta update.
title: Apple-Google Reportedly Collaborate to Make Switching Between Android and iPhone Easier

description: The new series Bhay: The Gaurav Tiwari Mystery explores the chilling real-life story of India’s first paranormal investigator. Premiering on December 12, 2025, the show streams free on Amazon MX Player and blends suspense, supernatural elements, and emotional depth. With eerie visuals, intense storytelling, and a focus on Gaurav’s mysterious death, the series promises to deliver a gripping thriller for audiences.
title: Bhay: The Gaurav Tiwari Mystery OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Black Shark gaming tablet is confirmed to launch in Malaysia soon. The Xiaomi-backed brand has posted new teasers on social media platforms confirming its arrival. The new model will have an 8-inch display. It will use a Qualcomm Snapdragon chipset. The Black Shark gaming tablet will have the company's signature cooling system.
title: Black Shark Gaming Tablet Teased to Launch Soon With Snapdragon Chip, 8.8-Inch Display

description: Google has denied reports that it plans to introduce ads in Gemini, calling the claims “uninformed” and “inaccurate.” The clarification came after a report suggested ads could appear in the chatbot by 2026. Google’s ads chief said there are no plans to change the current ad-free experience in the Gemini app. Speculation grew amid broader industry moves toward monetising AI tools, including tests at OpenAI.
title: Google Denies Reports of Ads in Gemini, Says No Such Plans in the Works

description: Tessa Thompson leads the modern reimagining of Hedda Gabler in Hedda (2025), now streaming on Prime Video. Directed by Nia DaCosta, the film explores themes of power, identity, and emotional turmoil. With strong performances and a bold visual style, Hedda is one of the most talked-about drama releases of the year.
title: Hedda Now Streaming on Prime Video: What You Need to Know About Tessa Thompson's Starrer Drama

description: Honor has announced the Magic 8 Lite in the UK, with a launch planned for early 2026 alongside the Magic 8 Pro. The phone features a 6.79-inch 1.5K OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and 6,000 nits peak brightness. It is powered by the Snapdragon 6 Gen 4 chipset with 8GB RAM and up to 512GB storage. The device packs a 108-megapixel main camera, a 7,500mAh battery with 66W fast charging, and IP69K-rated dust and water resistance.
title: Honor Magic 8 Lite With 7,500mAh Battery, 108-Megapixel Camera Launched: Availability, Features

description: Kaise Banta Hai Season 2 is streaming exclusively on JioHotstar. The show focuses on the making of products right from raw materials to fully formed products used for daily needs, shows the innovative ideas, creativity of the people involved, it had a successful season 1, and is now back with S2.
title: Kaise Banta Hai Season 2 Now Streaming on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know

description: Lava Play Max has been launched in India. The new phone comes in two colours with a 5,000mAh battery with support for 33W charging. It runs on a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset and has a 6.72-inch display. The new phone has Vapour Chamber cooling. The handset is advertised to support titles like COD Mobile, BGMI and Free Fire without any heating issues.
title: Lava Play Max Launched in India With Vapour Chamber Cooling, Dimensity 7300 SoC: Price, Specifications

description: Netflix’s bid to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery faces new obstacles as Paramount has reportedly made a hostile all-cash offer for the entire company. Paramount’s $30-per-share bid tops Netflix’s mixed cash-and-stock proposal, which excludes cable assets. At the same time, US President Donald Trump has raised antitrust concerns about Netflix’s deal. Shareholders and regulators will now play a pivotal role in determining the outcome.
title: Netflix-Warner Bros. Deal Far From Done: Paramount’s Hostile Bid and Trump’s Concerns, Know the Timeline

description: Realme will launch the Narzo 90 series in India on December 16, introducing the Narzo 90 and Narzo 90x. The phones will be sold via Amazon and the Realme India website and are positioned as value-for-money options. The Narzo 90 is aimed at students and professionals, while the Narzo 90x targets college users. The Narzo 90 5G is expected to come with up to 12GB RAM, a 120Hz OLED display, a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset, a 50-megapixel camera, and 80W fast charging.
title: Realme Narzo 90 Series India Launch Date Announced; RAM and Storage Variants, Colourways Leaked

description: Redmi Note 15 5G 108 Master Pixel Edition is confirmed to launch in India on January 6, 2026. Apart from the launch date, the design of the smartphone has also been teased by the company. It is shown to sport a curved display, while sporting a metal frame. It could feature a 6.8-inch AMOLED display with up to 120Hz refresh rate. The phone is said to be powered by a Snapdragon SoC and run on HyperOS. It might carry a 108-megapixel primary rear camera.
title: Redmi Note 15 5G 108 Master Pixel Special Edition India Launch Date; Amazon Availability Confirmed

description: Bitcoin slipped below the $90,000 mark as market sentiment remained cautious ahead of the US Federal Reserve’s policy announcement. Liquidity has thinned across major exchanges, and traders are watching $92,000 as the key level that could determine the next directional move. With Ethereum showing pockets of strength and altcoins under pressure, analysts expect heightened volatility once the Fed outlines its economic outlook.
title: Bitcoin Price Slips Below $90,000 as Crypto Market Liquidity Remains Thin

description: Apple topped the global best-selling smartphones list in the third quarter (Q3) of 2025, according to a report by a market research firm. The Cupertino-based tech giant took the top four spots, headlined by multiple models from its iPhone 16 series. Samsung also had five models among the top 10 best-selling smartphones, but none from its flagship Galaxy S or Galaxy Z-series lineups. The report reveals that the top 10 models contributed to a 20 percent share of the total smartphone market.
title: iPhone 16 Tops List of Best-Selling Smartphones in Q3 2025 as Apple, Samsung Lead the Market

description: Kaantha to be released on OTT platform Netflix in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu and Malayalam. It will also be released in Kannada as Shaantha on December 12th. No
title: Kaantha OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Dalquer Salman Starrer Movie Online?

description: The 2024 Korean animated series Let’s Go! Pororo Rangers has arrived on Netflix India, offering fun, colourful family entertainment. With Pororo and his team transforming into rangers to save the Earth, the show brings adventure, imagination, and positivity to young viewers.
title: Let’s Go! Pororo Rangers Now Streaming on Netflix India: Everything You Need to Know

description: Poco C85 5G has launched in India and the new smartphone ships with Android 15-based HyperOS 2.2. It carries a dual rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary shooter. On the front, it gets an 8-megapixel selfie camera. The handset packs a 6,000mAh battery with 33W wired fast charging support. It also ships with support for 10W wired reverse charging. The new Poco C85 5G is powered by an octa core 6nm MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chip, paired with up to 8GB of LPDDR4x RAM.
title: Poco C85 5G Launched in India With 6,000mAh Battery, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera: Price, Specifications

description: The Game Awards 2025 will feature an announcement on the future of Tomb Raider. Geoff Keighley and the official Tomb Raider X account confirmed that the future of the franchise will be revealed at the awards ceremony on December 11.
title: Future of the Tomb Raider Franchise Will Be Revealed at The Game Awards This Week

description: Intel has agreed with Tata Group to produce and assemble semiconductors in India for the local market, Tata announced on Monday. The partnership will also explore ways to quickly scale AI-powered PC solutions for consumers and businesses. India is expected to become one of the world’s top five markets by 2030, making this collaboration a major step for both companies.
title: Intel Signs Pact With Tata to Make, Assemble Semiconductors in India

description: Lenovo is reportedly preparing its first rollable gaming laptop under the Legion brand, called the Legion Pro Rollable. According to a new report, the device will feature a horizontally expanding OLED display that can switch to an ultrawide 21:9 aspect ratio for immersive gaming. It may debut at CES 2026 and launch commercially in early 2026. The laptop is expected to run Windows 11 on an Intel Core Ultra processor and support at least a 120Hz refresh rate. Pricing is likely to be premium.
title: Lenovo Legion Pro Rollable Gaming Laptop With Horizontal Rollable OLED Display to Launch in Early 2026: Report

description: OnePlus 15R will be launched globally by the Chinese smartphone maker in the third week of December. For the phone’s unveiling in India, the tech firm is hosting an event in Bengaluru. While it was already confirmed that the OnePlus Pad Go 2 will also be launched in global markets alongside the OnePlus 15R, the company has now revealed that it will also launch a smartwatch, dubbed OnePlus Watch Lite, on the same day. A dedicated microsite for the wearable is now live, teasing its key specifications and design.
title: OnePlus Watch Lite Launch Date Confirmed; Will Arrive Alongside OnePlus 15R, OnePlus Pad Go 2

description: Xiaomi could begin accepting pre-orders for the Xiaomi 17 Ultra on December 15. This could end on December 25. This timeline suggests that the official launch could take place on December 26. The new model will reportedly be priced similarly to the Xiaomi 15 Ultra in China. The Xiaomi 15 Ultra had a starting price of CNY 6,499 for the 12GB + 256GB variant.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Tipped to Launch With Same Price as Xiaomi 15 Ultra; Launch and Pre-Order Timeline Leaked

description: Johny Srouji, who is credited as the architect of Apple’s highly rated in-house chips effort, has reportedly quashed rumours surrounding a potential exit from the company. Recent reports claimed that Srouji had informed CEO Tim Cook about “seriously” leaving the company. The Apple executive also allegedly told executives that he would join another company if a departure materialised. Cook had reportedly taken steps to ensure Srouji’s tenure continued, and the campaign seems to have worked.
title: Apple Chip Chief Johny Srouji Reportedly Recommits to Stay Amid Ongoing Executive Turnover
Where Design Meets Camera Brilliance: A Closer Look at the Vivo X300 Series

description: Apple Fitness+ will be available in India later this month, the company announced on Monday. It is the Cupertino-based tech giant’s health and wellness subscription service that helps users with their workouts by providing access to trainer-guided workout videos, tracking real-time metrics, and earning rewards for goal accomplishments — all with just their iPhone. Following its latest expansion, Apple Fitness+ will be available in a total of 49 countries and regions around the world.
title: Apple Fitness+ Service for Guided Workouts to Launch in India on December 15

description: Poco C85 5G is launching later today at noon. The smartphone will go on sale in the country via Flipkart in Mystic Purple, Spring Green, and Power Black colour options. The phone will be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, coupled with 8GB of RAM. It will be backed by a 6,000mAh battery, which is claimed to offer over 106 hours of music playback. The upcoming phone will feature 33W wired fast charging and 10W wired reverse charging support, too. It will sport a 6.9-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
title: Poco C85 5G Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More
